mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO board_free( free_title, free_content, free_writer, board_no )
VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardNo}) ;
mapper.select:
SELECT bf.board_no AS boardNo, bf.free_title AS boardTitle, bf.free_writer AS boardWriter, bb.board_reg_date AS boardRegDate, bb.board_mod_date AS boardModDate, bb.board_view AS boardView, bb.category_board AS categoryBoard
FROM board_free bf LEFT JOIN base_board bb ON bf.board_no = bb.board_no
ORDER BY bf.board_no DESC
LIMIT 0, 10 ;
